title: Vietnamese Thit Bo Sao Dau
ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '500g (1 1/4 lb) beef sirloin steak, thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided', '1/2 onion, thinly sliced', '250g (9 oz) fresh green beans, trimmed', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', '1 teaspoon soy sauce']
